references: Amending: Ord 86300. Related: CF 258556, CF 258748, CF 258979, CF 259650.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 2.2, 3.03, 3.08, 3.21, 3.22, 3.27, 4.1, 13.5, of and adding new Sections 13A.1, 13A.2, 13A.3, 13A.4, 13A.5, 13A.6, 13B.1, 13B.2, 13B.3, 13B.4, 13B.5 and 13B.6 to the Zoning Ordinance (86300).
